BIO

Hi, my name is Nargiza Ozek. I was born in Kyrgyzstan, studied in Turkey and living in US. That being said besides English I am fluent in all other 3 languages, including Russian, Turkish and Kyrgyz.

My love and passion for coding goes back when I was in high school. Back then computer science classes were very new and I loved to sneak into lab room and explore. With an innate love of writing code I took C++ class at the University and it was amazing to be able to solve complex issues. Pursuing my passion I decided I will transition from being a mathematician to be a software developer, where I can use my problem solving skills to write code and keep both of my affections. To make this transition, I joined Digital Crafts, one of Houston's top-rated coding bootcamps.

On my spare time I like volunteering, going to meetups,reading books, or cooking with my kids - those little hands love to explore!

EDUCATION: B.Sc. Mathematics - Middle East Technical University, Turkey

2020 - Present

Entrepreneur

Full Stack Dveloper

Working on a React project to build a responsive full stack website for a startup.

2019 - Present

FreeCodeCamp

Event Organizer

Organizing Pizza and Code Meetup for 70 campers, setting up small groups to improve coding skills using www.freecodecamp.org curriculum

2019 - Present

NabiFreedom non-profit org.

Tech Director

Build full satck website with NodeJS,PUG... Will continue to cntribute to improve their website. www.nabifreedom.org

2017 - 2019

Kyrgyz Community at Houston

President

Served Kyrgyz Community, a minority group. Promoted engagement to connect with other diverse families. Helped new families to adjust to Houston.

2009 - 2017

Harmony Public Schools

Math Teacher

Here - I started my first internship, where I ended up being employed as a full time math teacher. I have worked mainly as a math teacher but was always flexible to any changes or needs that school had. Besides being a math teacher I had experience working as a math interventionist, computer science teacher, Turkish Languages teacher, Testing Coordinator and District Testing Coordinator.
